Text: So then...

Mitsugoshi has decided to join this upcoming MNA
tour project as a sponsor.
This just keeps getting worse.
We're completely surrounded...

Complain all you want. How could I ignore this
golden chance at an easy profit?
Easy? There could be something behind it!

Th-That's right! Like they say, if a story sounds
too good to be true, it probably is!

There's still money to be made. And if we can play
their agenda right, it's pure profit!
Now, for our City States expert!
Here I am!
Oh, for... I've been here before...
You have?

She's going to start going on about "Something
Power" soon.
Sigh...
Lambda, you were a soldier of the Velgalta Empire.

So you should be familiar with the City States as well
as their geographic and military value.
That's correct!

Now, the main area for this upcoming tour is around
Trade City Grazheim. It's a vital tourist center for
the region.
Vital? Is it really that big an attraction?
I thought the resort islands would be more popular.

Within Grazheim's academic district lies the Sacred
State of Orum, which has been essential to the
development of the Church as we know it.

Orum holds a cathedral which is the faith's center,
and has strong control over the churches found
all over the kingdom. It has power as great as
any nation's.
Can you give a concrete example of that?
Yes, ma'am! That would be the inquisition!
The inquisition?

Labeling someone or something, even a nation-state,
as heretical is a death sentence from the Church's
inquisition
So no nation can afford to ignore Orum.

That is one thing preventing war between Midgar and
the Velgalta Empire.

Orum is in control of the ancient Jugang Ruins which
is where warrior monks used to train in martial arts.

And it also might hold a clue to the Templars.
That is, if the reporter's keen eye isn't wrong.

Since the Church controls the inquisition, there may
well be some hidden connection with the Cult as it
gathers up the possessed for those "experiments."

At this point, we can only speculate, but, what if
the Church and Templars are connected?

Finding that out is part of your mission on this trip.
At least, that's what I assume Lady Alpha is thinking.
I'm not happy about going with Epsilon, but
I'm not saying I approve of Beta tagging along, but
Let's do it!
I'll do it!

Spoken like true members of the Seven Shadows!
You usually bicker, but you share the same ideals!

Let me know if you need anything for your tour of the
City States!

Mitsugoshi has everything ready from the latest
cosmetics to the trendiest fashion!
You seem so fulfilled lately, Gamma.
Like you've really found your element.

Heehee! Now, how will we get them to advertise
Mitsugoshi's goods?

Oh, Lady Alpha will be offering some preliminary
infiltration training to the both of you!
Understood. Let's get on with our preparations.
We're going to show real results from this mission!
